awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 8 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: Weronika lives in Poland. Vèronique lives in Paris. They don't know each other. Weronika gets a place in a music school, works hard, but collapses and dies on her first performance. At this point, Vèronique's life seems to take a turn and she decides not to be a singer...
plot: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.
title: The Double Life of Veronique
